meanings.sent1: The unawakened child slept peacefully through the night.
meanings.sent2: She felt unawakened in the morning until she had her coffee.
meanings.sent3: The unawakened alarm clock failed to rouse him from his slumber.
meanings.sent4: The unawakened city streets were quiet before dawn.
meanings.sent5: The unawakened forest was still and serene in the early hours.

meanings.sent1: His unawakened mind was closed off to new ideas.
meanings.sent2: She remained unawakened to the beauty of nature until she visited the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The unawakened student missed the important announcement in class.
meanings.sent4: Her unawakened perspective limited her understanding of the world.
meanings.sent5: The unawakened audience failed to appreciate the depth of the performance.

meanings.sent1: The unawakened computer screen remained blank.
meanings.sent2: The unawakened taste buds couldn't fully enjoy the flavorful dish.
meanings.sent3: The unawakened phone stayed silent in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: Her unawakened creativity needed a spark of inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The unawakened senses dulled his experience of the world.
